title: The AI power crunch: Grid realities collide with tech ambition
description: Surging electricity demand from AI data centers is colliding with a strained U.S. power grid, risking reliability. The nation’s nuclear energy ambitions face severe fuel supply chain vulnerabilities, including dependence on Russian uranium. Utilities struggle…
